SaveButton - Class in toolbar
Default button for the save functionality, is basic now, meant for future development

Class that saves the user script to a file

Class that takes the user script and generates the necessary class files and adds imports to the java file

setBorderGap(int) - Method in class ide.texteditor.TextLineNumber
The border gap is used in calculating the left and right insets of the border.

The Color used to render the current line digits.
setDigitAlignment(float) - Method in class ide.texteditor.TextLineNumber
Specify the horizontal alignment of the digits within the component.
setMinimumDisplayDigits(int) - Method in class ide.texteditor.TextLineNumber
Specify the mimimum number of digits used to calculate the preferred width of the component.

Set the update font property.
